channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain blocked. 4.05pm 24.1.25, 24th January
item.description:
Drain blocked by bus stop on St George's Road opposite the Ladies College. Photo taken 4.05pm 24.1.25.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Georges Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 7-8cm pot hole harp hill near junction to Stanley Road, 24th January
item.description:
See photo, just down the hill by junction of Stanley Road and Harp Hill. No properties next to it. Its level to the steps as the pavement finishes. The pothole is alongside/adjacent to the man hole cover.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 24th January
item.description:
Customer reports 2x signs and a barrier that has been leftover following repair of a manhole cover. States that they keep getting blown into the road by the wind and have to be picked up by residents and asking if they can be picked up.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights broken at lower fixing, 24th January
item.description:
Traffic light unit RHS of carriageway on A40 roundabout (Cheltenham side/Arle Court) has broken away at bottom mounting and swaying around in wind. Potential to come away from top in these high winds. Lights working OK though.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Traffic light head is facing wrong direction

item.title: ANOTHER trolley, 24th January
item.description:
This morning another trolley appeared at the end of Yeend Close at the junction with River Leys. The one I reported yesterday was still there this morning, I think they're breeding...!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 168-171, River Leys, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
